text: "Getting Late" is a song by performed by Floetry, issued as the third and final single from their debut studio album Floetic. It was written by Natalie Stewart and Marsha Ambrosius along with Vidal Davis; and it peaked at #31 on the Billboard R&B; chart in 2003. ==Chart positions== {|Class = "wikitable sortable" |- !Chart (2003) !Peak position |- |US Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Singles & Tracks (Billboard) |align=center|31 |} ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:2002 songs Category:2003 singles Category:DreamWorks Records singles Category:Floetry songs Category:Polydor Records singles Category:Songs written by Marsha Ambrosius Category:Songs written by Vidal Davis Category:Soul ballads Category:2000s ballads
title: Getting Late
